title: I'm no longer upset - OnePlus 8 Pro Unboxing & First Impressions
description: Finally, OnePlus released the Pro version of their phones in our region and we're able to unbox it today!  Check out the OnePlux 8 Pro at   Buy OnePlus Smartphones On Amazon (Paid Link):      On NewEgg (Paid Link):    On BHPhoto (Paid Link):      Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  GET MERCH:   Twitter:  Instagram:  Facebook:
